Couldn't have asked for anything more! Feel free to contact me for more information or pictures.

Reviews.Title: “Could I stay more than a week?”
Reviews.Author: Mexicodenegocios
Reviews.Content: I was kind of worried due to all the critics that I read before we went to the hotel, however, my experience was so nice that I want to share it. We went over just a few days after their openning. We were a party of 8, all couples. The suite is amazing, bed super soft and the jacuzzi on the room is lovely! People there were as nice as you expect mexicans to be and even more. Bellboys are always looking forward to help you. If you are looking for a place in which you can relax, this is definetely it! Maybe becouse we were just a few guests, however we spent a great time. I am looking forward to visit again any of the Karisma properties!

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT”
Reviews.Author: motzacat
Reviews.Content: This hotel goes beyond what I expected and I have been to Playa de Carmen many times. The food service and HUGE suites are the first items that come to mind. Add fabulous pools, pristine beach with no crowds, personalized service and a fantastic kids club to the mix and you have heaven on earth! We saw a family of monkeys in the trees beside our fabulous 2000 square foot suite with room for 8 of us! I did not feel like I was staying in a hotel at all, this resort is much more like an upscale home with 5 star room service. No crowds no line up for the buffet, I will never go back to the large scale "all inclusive" again!

Reviews.Title: “Colorado/Nebraska Visitors”
Reviews.Author: ellen1234502
Reviews.Content: Amazing experience! We stayed at Azul Fives prior to its official opening, and even so we couldn't have asked for more. Our rooms were absolutely gorgeous (very upscale & modern-style decor), and the staff was very accomodating. Even though the restaurants and spa were not yet open, we took advantage of the beautifully manicured grounds and unique winding pool while not at the beach. It's a few miles north of Playa del Carmen, making trips to and from activities in the area easily accessible. Security was excellent. The Wifi worked well - an essential for us. Azul Fives helped us make many happy memories and we hope to return in the future to take in more of the beauty and culture of the area.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay with or without teenagers.”
Reviews.Author: pilotrod
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay. Very beautiful resort, lots of landscaping. The pool serpentines through the whole property. My teenagers absolutely loved it. Great security, close to downtown Playa Del Carmen, about 10 minute cab ride. Good restaurants, spa, and nice beach. There are some rocks in the water , but you can walk about 100 yrds. down the beach and there is an area that is rock free for those who like to swim out in the gulf. The beach infinity pool is my favorite place to hang out, and the swim up bar is nice as well. You have a beautiful view of the Island of Cozumel and arriving and departing cruise ships. There are plenty of beach activities as well, such as para sailing, jet skies, fishing, snorkeling, diving, henna tattoos for the kids, hair braiding, ect. There are other nice hotels and restaurants close by within walking distance. The Tides is right next door, and is a little pricey, but has great food. There is also a small boutique hotel / restaurant next to the Tides called Cocos, A man and his wife run it, it sets back in the jungle a ways, but well worth the trip. You may have to ask how the get there, but is safe to walk to from the beach at night. They have great food at a great price. I recommend their pizza, it is cooked in a brick oven, over wood fire. On down a few 100 yrds. is another small boutique hotel called Petite La Fete, They have a nice beach bar and restaurant, with free wifi, and the best shrimp tacos I have ever had. Great casual place to walk to and have a cold cerveza and some lunch. It is my understanding that the Azul Fives tried to open way before it was completed, hence some of the earlier negative reviews. But it is completed now, and is truly a first class resort. I have been traveling to Playa for the last 10 years, fell in love with it, and the fives is one of my favorite places to stay, especially if you have children.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay - beautiful location”
Reviews.Author: enjoyvacation_10
Reviews.Content: My wife and my teenage daughters stayed for a week in July of 2009. The resort was not 100% open, but we had a fantastic stay regardless. The grounds and pools were beautiful and meticulously maintained, the security on site was excellent, and the support staff was very helpful. The location is close enough to Playa to make jaunts into town pretty quick and easy. If we planned a trip to the area again, this would be a place for us to consider for sure. Very clean, very contemporary and elegant.

Reviews.Title: “Will be an amazing place when it's fully open.”
Reviews.Author: Whatchado12
Reviews.Content: The Azul Fives was completely empty when I stayed there with friends, so we had the entire resort to ourselves. It was empty because construction was ongoing, but what was there was amazing. The pools were gorgeous and impeccably maintained. The beach was mostly secluded and the water was calm and swimmable. The rooms were spectactular - very large with all amenities. Even though there were just a handful of us there, grounds crews were hard at work all day, pools were clean, security was in view everywhere, and maid service was provided each 3 days. This was an amazing level of service given that the resort building was just in process. I loved the town of Playa del Carmen as well, and its proximity to Cozumel was perfect. For awhile, since it's new you may have to lower your expectations about restaurants and extensive services. Get over it and enjoy Mexico. The Azul Fives is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful!!!!”
Reviews.Author: sudohouse1
Reviews.Content: This was one of the best places we have stayed at in Playa del Carmen! We stayed in the one bedroom suite and it was amazing! The rooms were very spacious, the bed was amazingly comfortable and we were very surprised at the quality of the pillows, linens, towels, etc. Definitely felt upper-class. The pools were absolutely stunning and the beach club was great! All of the staff were friendly and very helpful. The food was incredible. The beach was beautiful, but the shoreline had rocks, so we had to be extra careful when going into the water, but otherwise a beautiful place to stay! We will definitely be going back and this time we are taking our families!

Reviews.Title: “I had a fabulous relaxing time and The Fives!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kellymartin7
Reviews.Content: The restaurants, pool bar are top notch. The infinity pool over looking the ocean is absolutely breathtaking!

Reviews.Title: “If you enjoy the beach and being in the ocean the Azul is not for you.”
Reviews.Author: tapha5
Reviews.Content: The hotel was great. We had very nice rooms, the pools were very nice, and we liked how the resort was laid out. The restraunts, pools, and bars were all close to our rooms. Talking about the rooms we had the suite which consisted of a separate bedroom for the kids, a sitting television room, and our bedroom which was great. Now to the bad part. If you are a beer drinker and you like it cold Azul is not for you. All beer served is draft DoSequie hope I spelled that right I doubt if I did, and the beer is about 50 to 60 degrees. The beach is terrible if you are a beach goer, rocks and lots of seaweed that comes in on the beach that looks like landscaping mulch and it is about 2 feet in height. Yuk. There was a group of 17 of us and we love to be in the water and lay on the beach and drink Cold Beer not hot. 99 percent of the staff was awesome, except for 2 employees. One was the hostess at LeChic who was a B the other was a guy working up front where we were checking out. Our plane was departing at 6pm that night, but check out is noon. We checked out of our room at noon but did not go to the front desk and let them know. They charged us $30 dollars for a late checkout and he was a D. Almost forgot we wanted to play volleyball and they had 6 workers who took care of the volleyball arrangements. They gave us hell about us just playing with each other and they called one of the ladies in our party Fing B little did they realize she is fluent in Spanish. Got to quit rambling bottom line if you like being at the swimming pool and like your beer warm this place is for you. Again great resort except for what I mentioned earlier.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Customer Service and nothing is ready”
Reviews.Author: djbourbon
Reviews.Content: The rooms - Beautiful. The pools Beautiful. The service - HORRIBLE. Even down by the pool.. there are no towels... half the restaurants are closed when you want them... Not a destination at all!

Reviews.Title: “Make them PAY!!!”
Reviews.Author: cbsmith100
Reviews.Content: They were happy to take my $6000 deposit for a 3 BR penthouse when they knew there ws no chance in delivering on the reservation. Thanks to reviews and comments in here I did not accept their offer to stay at one of their other properties. They wanted me to stay in 2 regular rooms and couldn't even guarantee they would be together and I'm traveling with my 3 toddlers!! I was able to find a another great spot at a great last minute deal - thankfully I don't have to eat six plane tix. So let's make Karisma think twice about poor customer service. Simply do not stay at their resorts. There are plenty other great resorts and locations in the world happy to take your hard earned money and treat you well. They've proven they do not care about their clients so why should we care about their business!

HotelInfo.Name: Azul Fives by Karisma
HotelInfo.Address: Predio El Limonar Fraccion 2 | Xcalacoco, Municipio de Solidaridad, Playa del Carmen, Mexico
